name: Nightmare II: Bumbles Revenge
overview: A spooky text adventure and sequel to the original Nightmare game written by the mighty William Quinn using the Graphic Adventure Creator (GAC). You thought you had finally found rest in your messy room looking like you want it to but as you start to drift back to reality you are yanked back by the long arm of the law. P.C. Bumble wants to know where the money from his wallet is... you find yourself sitting in the back of a police car. Return Bumbles cash so you can get some rest!
